overview.en: Student Coin (STC) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Student Coin has a current supply of 2,100,000,000 with 0 in circulation. The last known price of Student Coin is 0.02131181 USD and is up 9.20 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 2 active market(s) with $417,736.15 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://www.studentcoin.education.
